title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about an FDA official’s speech, a Grail cancer blood test, and much more
description: The FDA's top drug regulator indicated in her first address to staff that she will scrutinize antidepressants and shots used to protect babies from RSV
content: The FDA's top drug regulator indicated in her first address to staff that she will scrutinize antidepressants and shots used to protect babies from RSV
